toLevel2.question: Which three types of electromagnetic radiation make up most of the energy from the Sun?
toLevel2.correctExplanation: The Sun emits approximately 7% UV, 44% visible light, and 48% infrared, together accounting for over 99% of solar radiation.

distractors.answer: Radio waves, microwaves, and X-rays
distractors.explanation: Students may confuse common EM types with solar radiation; these make up less than 1% of sunlight.
